author: smuzaffar
body:
As reported in #34718 , this PR moves headers in interface directory for `DetectorDescription`
```
      2 src/DetectorDescription/Core/src/Box.h
      2 src/DetectorDescription/Core/src/Cons.h
      2 src/DetectorDescription/Core/src/CutTubs.h
      2 src/DetectorDescription/Core/src/EllipticalTube.h
      2 src/DetectorDescription/Core/src/ExtrudedPolygon.h
      5 src/DetectorDescription/Core/src/LogicalPart.h
      6 src/DetectorDescription/Core/src/Material.h
      2 src/DetectorDescription/Core/src/Polycone.h
      2 src/DetectorDescription/Core/src/Polyhedra.h
      1 src/DetectorDescription/Core/src/PseudoTrap.h
     18 src/DetectorDescription/Core/src/Solid.h
      4 src/DetectorDescription/Core/src/Specific.h
      2 src/DetectorDescription/Core/src/Sphere.h
      2 src/DetectorDescription/Core/src/Torus.h
      2 src/DetectorDescription/Core/src/Trap.h
      1 src/DetectorDescription/Core/src/TruncTubs.h
      2 src/DetectorDescription/Core/src/Tubs.h
```
title: [DD] Move public headers in to interface directory
